name: The Night Before Starwars
description:
To Save Spacemas, you must fly across the planet and collect all the neccesary components, while shootering the empire along the way!

CONTROLS (PLS READ IT DOESNT SAY THEM IN GAME AT ALL LMAO):

W & S
Accelerate and Brake
A & D
Turn (and also kind of strafe)
Q & E
Ascend and Descend
Mouse & Left Click
Aim and Shoot
EscapeInstantly Quit

This game was made as a gift for Frederic Morel, for the 2022 Secret Santa Game Jam! It was prompted by an anonymous letter saying "Shooter In Style Starwars".

This is the first time ive ever really made an action game by myself, and it's all thanks to that prompt, so please enjoy, and happy holidays!

Credits:

  • Most of the sound effects and all of the music come from starwars of course! particularly the star wars SNES games, which were a big inspiration. 
  • It also uses a sound effect from Metal Gear Solid and a sound effect from Sonic 3 & Knuckles and several others from the internet that are not star wars.
  • The codebase for this game was based on an old joint project with Austin Heller, and a lot of his movement and camera code survives in this version.  Check out his games and music! The old version was a Nausicaa inspired game. It had all sorts of mechanics coded and planned, including dynamic trade ships and economies between cities, and a big event that would happen after enough time passes. It was too ambitious for us at the time but i'm glad I was able to use some of it, and finally give it a proper combat system. Maybe someday I'll come back to this engine for something else!
